r.d: It takes an array of data as input and pages it according to various parameters. It also builds links within a specified range, and allows complete customization of the output (it even works with front controllers and mod_rewrite). Two operating modes available: "Jumping" and "Sliding" window style.
r.n: - fixed bug #13604: WARNINGS with PHP 5.3-dev [thanks to Chris Troup] - request #13567: support for regexp in 'excludeVars' [thanks to Stefano Coletta] - fixed bug #13913 empty prev/next image shown when only one page exists [cweiske] - fixed bug #13881: fix for relative links (introduced in v.2.4.5) may cause some issues with absolute links
